attributes.action: Stop the government from allowing Syrian refugees into the country
attributes.additional_details:
these people are crossing through countries that they could settle in and be safe and heading for the European countries that they know they are going to get money , these people are paying organised criminals to get them through Europe , 
If they are so poor and suffering so badly , where do they get the money to pay come through ????
attributes.background: We need to quickly counter act a petition which is going to force the governments hand into allowing Syrian refugees into Britain we need a show of numbers to let the government know that we don't want to allow this

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107137

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
